title: Why it's a good time to be Goldman Sachs
teaser: Goldman Sachs reported its latest business results on Tuesday. Profits -- as measured by net income -- hit $1.9 billion in the second quarter, twice the performance of the quarter before.
contentencoded:
Goldman Sachs reported its latest business results on Tuesday. Profits -- as measured by net income -- hit $1.9 billion in the second quarter, twice the performance of the quarter before.

Juli Niemann, analyst with Smith, Moore & Company, joins Marketplace Morning Report host David Brancaccio to discuss.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Tuesday, July 16, 2013
description: Goldman Sachs reported its latest business results on Tuesday. Profits -- as measured by net income -- hit $1.9 billion in the second quarter, twice the performance of the quarter before.
